job.title: Engineering Lead - Big Data Platforms
job.description:
Want to build a stronger, more sustainable future and cultivate your career? Join Cargill's global team of 160,000 employees who use new technologies, dynamic insights and over 154 years of experience to connect farmers with markets, customers with ingredients, and people and animals with the food they need to thrive.
Job Purpose and Impact
The Lead Data Platform Engineer, will be a subject matter specialist to independently lead the engineering and development of software products and platforms within the organization. In this role, you will conduct strategic architecture, design, development, quality assurance, configuration, deployment, and support to ensure smooth, stable and timely delivery of the Cargill Data Platform to a vast amount of Cargill users globally.
Key Accountabilities
Equal Opportunity Employer, including Disability/Vet.
